name: Glacier Bay Curved Shower Rod - Chrome Aluminum Tension Rod
description: Add both luxury and extra space to your shower area with the innovative Glacier Bay Adjustable Tension Curved Shower Rod. Made of rust-proof aluminum, the rod is sturdy and durable, and curves outward to add up to 5 in. of useful elbow room inside your shower. The rich chrome finish complements any bath decor.Quickly and securely installs with no tools requiredRod adjusts easily to fit shower spaces from 50 in. to 72 in.Aluminum construction comes with limited lifetime warrantySized to work with any standard shower curtain
